title: Christ Scourged
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, by April 1951 until November 1, 1951 [1]; their gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1951.

Notes:
[1]. The etching was delivered to Carnegie Institute in April 1951, as per note from Mrs. Beal on possible gifts offered to Carnegie Institute, dated October 1951. The purchase price was likely $100 (see price annotation by Mrs. Beal on the list of Beal gifts accessioned on November 1, 1951.)
